title: T206 Joss Broad Leaf 460 SGC10 For Sale
author: Brailey

posts.post_title: T206 Joss Broad Leaf 460 SGC10 For Sale
posts.post_content:
Due to unforeseen circumstances I am accepting offers on my Broad Leaf 460 Joss Hands at Chest SGC10 card.  A couple heavy creases and wear but no paper loss.  Card can be seen at:

[url]http://imageevent.com/brailey/cardsforsale[/url]

Please contact me at [url]mikebrailey@yahoo.com[/url]

I will price the card this weekend if I don't sell it privately prior to then. 

Thanks,
Mike Brailey
